website_summaries.verdict: A solid dual-voltage option that delivers bursts of steam to effectively banish wrinkles.
pros: Dual voltage is good for travel abroad
Slightly larger than most travel irons, so it's easy to handle and works fast
cons: A little larger than most travel irons, and there's no auto shut-off feature

customer_reviews.title: Great for quilting in small spaces or for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a quilting retreat that I had to fly to. Nice small size fits in baggage easily and comes with a drawstring bag and a little water cup. When I say LITTLE, just know that the steam runs out very quickly as it holds so little water. I would maybe get three minutes out of it before having to refill. It works nicely and I prefer the pointier sole plate vs other travel irons I have used that are too round and blunt for precision work. I recommend this iron with slight reservation for the short life of the steam, but it is rather expected for a tiny iron.
customer_reviews.author: Honestly

customer_reviews.title: Handle Needs Snug Lockin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this iron for quilting and sewing projects. I used it today for the first time. This iron puts out allot of steam and has a small pointed end that fits into tights places. The only negative thing about it so far is that the handle doesn't lock in place solidly and moves a little when you pick it up to iron - that is a little annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: The end of a beautiful friendship!
customer_reviews.text: This little iron is everything that I wished it would be. Mostly, I am very happy that the water lasts a long time. I have been using it as a dry iron, but when I need some steam I just press a button for a burst of steam. The size is perfect for quilting and will be terrific to take on a trip. Unfortunately, my little iron quit on me today. I have not used it much, but I loved it very much, this is a sad day for me.
customer_reviews.author: Oona

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with iron. Great replacement for my old Black/Decker travel iron. Fast shipping. Later Review: After two months the cover for the handle has come off. The part that is off is the thumb press for the steam. Hot water comes out thru the top. I wish they still made the old Black/Decker travel iron. Dumped it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: AAA

customer_reviews.title: Used this for a couple of weeks before the handle ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a couple of weeks before the handle latch gave way. I have to use a small ball under the handle to keep it from collapsing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This little iron has been great for next to my sewing table
customer_reviews.text: This little iron has been great for next to my sewing table. To some the handle might be a little wobbly but I don't press hard or back and forth. For my quilting needs it is perfect! Lightweight, heats up SUPER fast and great steam if you want it. Someone complained about having to unplug it to turn it off. I do that anyway to make sure my irons are OFF. Also, I use a surge protector for my electronic sewing machine and unplug that also. Just a habit with power surges and loss of electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Loving my little Z&Z iron!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a quilter and I needed a smaller iron that would get really hot and this little beauty does the trick. Have only had it a few days but really enjoying it and thrilled that I found this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita E. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Steam Feature Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for travel. Iron gets very hot even on low setting. In addition to travel I wanted to use the steam function to get wrinkles out of my curtains without taking them down. The steam feature doesn't work. I added the water and waited for the steam. NOPE!
customer_reviews.author: TLynnPowell

customer_reviews.title: Great iron for quilting retreats and classes
customer_reviews.text: Great iron for quilting retreats and classes! Plenty of heat and steam to be effective pressing quilt squares. The temperature dial is a little hard to turn and I don't feel comfortable just setting it on "min" to be off so I just unplug it. Handle folds a little for packing. I would recommend this to quilters looking for a travel iron. This price was very reasonable. I hope it lasts for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... this on our cruise this summer and it worked WONDERFULLY. Used it in our room
customer_reviews.text: Took this on our cruise this summer and it worked WONDERFULLY. Used it in our room, using our table with a towel on it as my ironing board. It's a good size, packs well in its own pouch and it GET'S HOT and stays HOT.
customer_reviews.author: Irene O.

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect! just enough heat and steam to tidy my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always carried a travel iron and was heartbroken when mine suddenly stopped working after 20 years of faithful service. We were about to depart for a month abroad and I was stressed. I ordered your ZZ stainless Steel Soleplate hoping it would arrive before we left. I was thrilled to have it in hand in four days. It was perfect! just enough heat and steam to tidy my linen and an accurate temperature gauge for silks and synthetic fabrics! LOVE IT! I feel good when my clothing is neat. I take care of my clothing: I tend to invest. Thanks! our trip was great!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Stetter

customer_reviews.title: I received the iron on time and was highly impressed with the excellent customer service from the seller from the time I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the ZZT1962-G Dual voltage Travel iron to replace a non-stainless steel one I had and for its travel convenience. I received the iron on time and was highly impressed with the excellent customer service from the seller from the time I ordered and after the iron was delivered. He continued to check in with me while I was testing the performance of the iron before writing a review. The iron works very well and I really like it. I highly recommend both the seller and the iron for anyone in need of a good iron that is also convenient for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Ransford Domertey Tsatsu

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this iron in 2016 Oct. Got a ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this iron in 2016 Oct. Got a replacement for it in 2017, I seldom use it.. But this new replacement is not heating up again.. Hmm I think it was my 3rd use on it..
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Snow

customer_reviews.title: Very good size
customer_reviews.text: Its very nice product it can be used in orher countries , small size easy to fit the luggage
customer_reviews.author: Mirelan

customer_reviews.title: Water refill system is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.text: This would be a 5 star little iron except for the utterly ridiculous design of the water refill. I don’t know what genius came up with it, but having to put water in the thing is a huge lesson in patience each time. I’d never buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: L. Hauser

customer_reviews.title: Leaky iron.
customer_reviews.text: This little iron leaked from day one. I still use it as a dry iron for small items but I have a feeling it will be gone soon. Its really not worth the real estate it takes up in my laundry room cupboard.
customer_reviews.author: Nitpicker

customer_reviews.title: while not great, did a better job than this little guy
customer_reviews.text: While cute, it did not work. It only got warm and the steam came out in streams of water. The iron in the hotel, while not great, did a better job than this little guy.
customer_reviews.author: JustMe22

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this iron and used it for less than two months and the temperature controll won't move and it no longer heats up I gave it one star because it didn't last.. I loved this iron and feel badly that it didn't last longer. I'm trying another one in hopes it last longer. I use it by my sewing machine for quilt making small blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Leona J. Raiger

customer_reviews.title: but it gets pretty hot and does a good
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used the steam function, but it gets pretty hot and does a good job
customer_reviews.author: Mischief_Mangoed

customer_reviews.title: ... when I use it and the steam function isn't great.
customer_reviews.text: This leaks water when I use it and the steam function isn't great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: iron does not work in vertical position
customer_reviews.text: The iron appears to only work when it is in the horizontal position....We thought we would be able to steam wrinkles out of shirts and blouses holding the iron vertical while the clothes are hanging on a hanger. IT DOES NOT SEEM TO WORK IN THE VERtiCLE POSITION.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Item failure
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this item for almost 2 months but after a week I didn't use it at all. It just don't get power . I plugged in and not even the red light turns on. I would like to know if there's anything to do about it
customer_reviews.author: pedro alberto hernandez oliva

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this iron. It is easy to pack and has good steam capabilities so works wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: DebT

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: A pretty good little iron. I think it is easier to manage because it isn't a full size iron. It isn't tiny though, it's like a mid size.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy S.

customer_reviews.title: The product was recently used and the recipient was pleased with this travel iron
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time and is as described. It was bought as a gift. The product was recently used and the recipient was pleased with this travel iron
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Great little steamer
customer_reviews.text: Great little steamer. Folds flat doesn't take up room in travel bags.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great for Quilters
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little iron. I actually use it for pressing pieced blocks for quilting. Works just as well as the higher priced Rowenta and I love that it doesn't have the auto shut-off that can be so annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just died one day
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay for the first few times I used it. But a couple months later, it just died. Doesn't work at all. Save yourself the hassle and buy something better you won't have to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M

customer_reviews.title: just ok
customer_reviews.text: this iron ,leaks water as soon as you turn it on until it gets hot
customer_reviews.author: Charles B. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Works great and perfect size too!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and works great for a college kid and limited dorm space.
customer_reviews.author: AJay

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the size.
customer_reviews.text: It heats up instantly and irons as good as a normal sized one. Very pleased although I haven't used it for a long period of time to have a more reliable opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Michalis G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little iron! I use it for pressing quilt blocks
customer_reviews.author: June Copeck

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I realize it was a "travel" size. but this is tiny!
customer_reviews.author: ADAAI

customer_reviews.title: Great Iron
customer_reviews.text: Purchase the item for my daughter who is traveling overseas she said the Ironworks very nice
customer_reviews.author: Robert Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Stopped heating
customer_reviews.text: Had since April and will no longer heat. Worked great when it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect can't complain just plug and bring to the desired setting and iron
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handle Broke Week 2 of Ownership
customer_reviews.text: I bought this iron to take with me on a 3 week trip to Europe. At first, it was working great but then the handle snapped off week 2. Very unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shape!
customer_reviews.text: Fast service. Great iron! Love the shape to iron small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: maxine nafie

customer_reviews.title: Great little iron
customer_reviews.text: Great little iron. Easy to use. Took it on a cruise. It is light works great and got it the next day.
customer_reviews.author: pomlover

customer_reviews.title: Waoh!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it!!!. Some but very effective iron for a fast job. I will recommend it to all my friends. The only downside is the water storage is too small for a long use.
customer_reviews.author: Amircat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this iron the color is just absolutely perfect. Works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Byer

customer_reviews.title: I use this for quilting and traveling
customer_reviews.text: Love this compact iron which is great for traveling because it packs well. I use this for quilting and love that it as it does not automatically shut off. It is always hot so ready to press immediately. To make sure I don't forget it on I have it plugged into a powerstrip and either turn that off or unplug the iron. Compact and easy to handle. Great for traveling. Love love love this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with product
customer_reviews.text: Like several of the other reviewers, I purchased this littlle iron for quilt classes and retreats. It has been a huge disappointment from day one. The Thermo regulator is frozen. Handle is quite loose and moves all the time. Had one medium sized discoloration/too hot spot on soleplate and attempted to clean with soleplate cleaner. Instead of removing the spot it.. (spot).. spread quickly over entire soleplate and I have been unable to clean the mess. My opinion would be..this little and cute purple iron is not a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: patricia barnes

customer_reviews.title: AA T1962-P Dual voltage travel steam iron
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this iron on my quilt instructors recommendations and she was correct. This is a great little iron and it gets pretty hot. I like using it when I quilt since I can set it up on a little table next to my sewing machine and it is so easy to use and doesn't take up much room but I love it and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get Crafty
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel but even better for craft projects and ironing on patches.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia62

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great & the size is perfect for my suitcase
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Castillo

customer_reviews.title: works fine on both steam and dry
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, travels well, works fine on both steam and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille Walters

customer_reviews.title: This iron is make very much like the Rowenta travel iron
customer_reviews.text: This iron is make very much like the Rowenta travel iron. However my Rowenta lasted 10 years, this, two weeks. The temperature control went out. It is HOT all the time, even at the lowest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Since I didn't buy this iron for traveling it's a little annoying and painful bending over each time I use it
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this powerful little iron a five star except that it does not have an off/on switch. I have to keep unplugging it. Since I didn't buy this iron for traveling it's a little annoying and painful bending over each time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: is handling my delicates and synthetics like a dream
customer_reviews.text: I'm going 4 for now and I've got to tell you, I've been using a Tesla iron for some time now and ironically, this little trooper which is still a 'starter' item, is handling my delicates and synthetics like a dream. Even at its highest setting, which doesn't feel as hot as most regular sized irons, it gets the job done. My uniforms are loving it.
customer_reviews.author: SLEEC

customer_reviews.title: Great not only for travel but also for regular use
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and ease of use of this iron, it is not only useful for travel but unless you iron your bed sheets, this seems much more useful to me than the regular big irons which are absolutely inconvenient for ironing clothes, especially ladies' shirts etc.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Lihacova

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter who is learning to sew. It's a perfect size for her and she loves the color. We haven't tried steam yet but everything works great. Delivery was very prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Margie5

customer_reviews.title: Great value and perfect performance
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a similar item in the past. Paid much much more. Broke within a year. This one, the steam is super strong. I love that it steams well. The price phenomenal. I'd buy it again if it broke within a year. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ruchy

customer_reviews.title: Small size but produces similar results as a big sized iron.
customer_reviews.text: Carried it with me through my international trips. Was handy and helped me where the hotels doesnt provide a quick iron. With the dual voltage, it can be used in most places around the world. For its small size, it performed really well.
customer_reviews.author: Altec Lansing

customer_reviews.title: Great Iron
customer_reviews.text: I use this iron for quilting projects - love the steam output and the heat - would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Nice & compact
customer_reviews.text: Nice & compact, bought damaged box $9.74, great steam but only in horizontal, no vertical steam as picture shows. Handle locks, but with enough force anything can be broken. Holds small amount of water in handle.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for pressing seams open while sewing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for pressing seams open while sewing. With a small ironing board sitting next to my machine, this iron saves me time as I don't have to get up and down to use the regular size iron and ironing board. Love the color too
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Phillipson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for  traveling
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size for traveling and it is very user friendly perfect to keep your clothes looking good
customer_reviews.author: Efrain Hidalgo

customer_reviews.title: ... next day wife took on trip said it worked great
customer_reviews.text: Received iron on time next day wife took on trip said it worked great
customer_reviews.author: Rick Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Love the steam
customer_reviews.text: I researched many travel irons and finally chose this one. It does not feel "squirrelly" in my hand. Love the steam. It's exactly what I was looking for. Plenty hot for my quilting projects.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: travel iron
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my travel iron. It works great and I love the color. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jane E. Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and love the slim size. Not too small to where it's ineffective but just right.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Too large for my travel needs
customer_reviews.text: I found the iron to be too large to meet my needs As a travel iron. I needed the smallest travel iron I could find. Others were smaller.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This travel steam iron delivers the most heat and steam for its size. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: jmom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This little iron is 1/3 of the price of the Rowenta and looks almost identical....
customer_reviews.author: andrea I mccart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love love love.. a bit small but i love it
customer_reviews.author: Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Efficient iron for travel & sewing.
customer_reviews.text: Small & light weight. Great for the traveling or sewing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She may never need it for traveling, but it is the size she was wanting.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the handle would be awkward, but it isn't. My mom wanted something small and light. This iron is everything she was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Came just in time. Our larger iron broke down ...
customer_reviews.text: Came just in time. Our larger iron broke down and my husband used this little iron to iron his shirts.
customer_reviews.author: lucybe62

customer_reviews.title: This product sucks. It leaked
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks. It leaked. The button to create steam was hard to push. It shouldn't even get one star. I literally threw it in the trash. Yep trashed it. I would feel wrong for garage selling it for a $1.00 TY amazon for the credit. They didn't even argue with me. Just keep it they said. Obviously they have heard that before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: light, small and can iron clothes nicely
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little iron for my college-bound kid. It is small, light and easy to handle. As I heard from her, it is what she wants for her dorm room. She can iron her professional clothes on her desk and it works well without much effort.
customer_reviews.author: BookToRead

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a good stuff to have, it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Germain

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Top water leaks out but for the price its whatever

product_meta.title: ZZ TI962-P Dual Voltage Travel Steam Iron with Stainless Steel Soleplate 1000 Watt，Purple
feature_bullets: Dual voltage system 115 Volt/230 Volt is designed for travel
Burst of steam helps remove stubborn wrinkles and clean iron steam vents
The Folding Handle of the compact design are convenient for storage and portable
Continuous steam; Heats up in less than 15 seconds; Indicator light lets you know the perfect time for ironing
Temperature adjustable setting works on nearly all of the fabrics; Plenty of steam vents

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars143 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: Manufacturer warranty for 365 days from date of purchase.
